snippet: The N.C.A.A. placed Baylor on three years’ probation after an investigation turned up impermissible telephone calls and text messages sent to high school recruits by coaches and assistants on the men’s and women’s basketball teams.
abstract: NCAA places Baylor on three years’ probation after an investigation turned up impermissible telephone calls and text messages sent to high school recruits by coaches and assistants on the men’s and women’s basketball teams.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. placed Baylor on three years’ probation after an investigation turned up impermissible telephone calls and text messages sent to high school recruits by coaches and assistants on the men’s and women’s basketball teams.
